quote: You don't choose your family. They are God's gift to you, as you are to them.
name: Desmond Tutu

quote: I just find myself happy with the simple things. Appreciating the blessings God gave me.
name: DMX

quote: Your talent is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift back to God.
name: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Never lose an opportunity of seeing anything beautiful, for beauty is God's handwriting.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: God gave us the gift of life; it is up to us to give ourselves the gift of living well.
name: Voltaire

quote: When you focus on being a blessing, God makes sure that you are always blessed in abundance.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: I'm blessed and I thank God for every day for everything that happens for me.
name: Lil Wayne

quote: God will never give you anything you can't handle, so don't stress.
name: Kelly Clarkson

quote: God gave us memory so that we might have roses in December.
name: James M. Barrie

quote: You cannot believe in God until you believe in yourself.
name: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Every day I feel is a blessing from God. And I consider it a new beginning. Yeah, everything is beautiful.
name: Prince

quote: Do not let your hearts be troubled. Trust in God; trust also in me.
name: Jesus Christ

quote: When I wake up every morning, I thank God for the new day.
name: F. Sionil Jose

quote: Friends are the siblings God never gave us.
name: Mencius

quote: Talent is God given. Be humble. Fame is man-given. Be grateful. Conceit is self-given. Be careful.
name: John Wooden

quote: I believe that whatever comes at a particular time is a blessing from God.
name: A. R. Rahman

quote: I can find God in nature, in animals, in birds and the environment.
name: Pat Buckley

quote: Mother is the name for God in the lips and hearts of little children.
name: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: I may not be where I want to be, but thank God I am not where I used to be.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: God could not be everywhere, and therefore he made mothers.
name: Rudyard Kipling

quote: Prayer does not change God, but it changes him who prays.
name: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: After women, flowers are the most lovely thing God has given the world.
name: Christian Dior

quote: I believe that God put us in this jolly world to be happy and enjoy life.
name: Robert Baden-Powell

quote: Through hard work, perseverance and a faith in God, you can live your dreams.
name: Ben Carson

quote: In the first place, God made idiots. That was for practice. Then he made school boards.
name: Mark Twain

quote: I just thank God for all of the blessings.
name: James Brown

quote: God used beautiful mathematics in creating the world.
name: Paul Dirac

quote: Thank God men cannot fly, and lay waste the sky as well as the earth.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Whosoever is delighted in solitude is either a wild beast or a god.
name: Aristotle

quote: It is foolish and wrong to mourn the men who died. Rather we should thank God that such men lived.
name: George S. Patton

quote: Where can we go to find God if we cannot see Him in our own hearts and in every living being.
name: Swami Vivekananda

quote: I will thank God for the day and the moment I have.
name: Jim Valvano

quote: Reputation is what men and women think of us; character is what God and angels know of us.
name: Thomas Paine

quote: God has given you one face, and you make yourself another.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: You see, God helps only people who work hard. That principle is very clear.
name: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Ignorance is the curse of God; knowledge is the wing wherewith we fly to heaven.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: God has given us two hands, one to receive with and the other to give with.
name: Billy Graham

quote: God gives every bird its food, but He does not throw it into its nest.
name: Josiah Gilbert Holland

quote: God's mercy is fresh and new every morning.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: Never trust anyone completely but God. Love people, but put your full trust only in God.
name: Lawrence Welk

quote: I am still far from being what I want to be, but with God's help I shall succeed.
name: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Wine is constant proof that God loves us and loves to see us happy.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: I am as bad as the worst, but, thank God, I am as good as the best.
name: Walt Whitman

quote: Our prayers should be for blessings in general, for God knows best what is good for us.
name: Socrates

quote: Dog is God spelled backward.
name: Duane Chapman

quote: Anyone can count the seeds in an apple, but only God can count the number of apples in a seed.
name: Robert H. Schuller

quote: Create like a god, command like a king, work like a slave.
name: Constantin Brancusi

quote: Honesty is of God and dishonesty of the devil; the devil was a liar from the beginning.
name: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: God gives us relatives; thank God, we can choose our friends.
name: Addison Mizner

quote: Pray as though everything depended on God. Work as though everything depended on you.
name: Saint Augustine

quote: Thank you, God, for this good life and forgive us if we do not love it enough.
name: Garrison Keillor

quote: I like smoking! I mean, God, I quit everything else, can't I smoke?
name: Melanie Griffith

quote: Be brave and be fearless, and for God's sake, stand up for yourself.
name: Gretchen Carlson

quote: If we ever forget that we are One Nation Under God, then we will be a nation gone under.
name: Ronald Reagan

quote: God had one son on earth without sin, but never one without suffering.
name: Saint Augustine

quote: Suicide is man's way of telling God, 'You can't fire me - I quit.'
name: Bill Maher

quote: Our Lord has written the promise of resurrection, not in books alone, but in every leaf in springtime.
name: Martin Luther

quote: There is no surprise more magical than the surprise of being loved: It is God's finger on man's shoulder.
name: Charles Morgan

quote: I have had a happy life and thank the Lord. Goodbye and may God bless all!
name: Christopher McCandless

quote: Let God's promises shine on your problems.
name: Corrie Ten Boom

quote: God is to be worshipped as the one beloved, dearer than everything in this and next life.
name: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Power always thinks... that it is doing God's service when it is violating all his laws.
name: John Adams

quote: Coincidence is God's way of remaining anonymous.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Clouds symbolize the veils that shroud God.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: Next to the Word of God, the noble art of music is the greatest treasure in the world.
name: Martin Luther

quote: On Sunday morning, I'm not nervous... I can't wait to tell what God wants me to say.
name: Charles Stanley

quote: I feel like God has blessed me so much already, and he keeps continuing to bless me.
name: Odell Beckham, Jr.

quote: God never ends anything on a negative; God always ends on a positive.
name: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is God's gift, that's why we call it the present.
name: Joan Rivers

quote: God works wonders now and then; Behold a lawyer, an honest man.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: God made you a masterpiece - be blessed, secure, disciplined and equipped.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: Pray, and let God worry.
name: Martin Luther

quote: Woman was God's second mistake.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that proceeds from the mouth of God.
name: Jesus Christ

quote: God has always given me the strength to say what is right.
name: Rosa Parks

quote: Keep your nose out the sky, keep your heart to god, and keep your face to the raising sun.
name: Kanye West

quote: Woman is a ray of God. She is not that earthly beloved: she is creative, not created.
name: Rumi

quote: Without your health, you've got nothing going on. I thank God every day for good health.
name: Ric Flair

quote: You don't look out there for God, something in the sky, you look in you.
name: Alan Watts

quote: A baby is God's opinion that life should go on.
name: Carl Sandburg

quote: Just be yourself, and enjoy the blessings that God's borne out on you.
name: Delilah

quote: If you suffer, thank God! It is a sure sign that you are alive.

quote: Every morning I wake up and thank God.
name: Aaron Neville

quote: I tremble for my country when I reflect that God is just; that his justice cannot sleep forever.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: I'm grateful to God for His bountiful gifts... He gave me courage and faith in myself.
name: Loretta Young

quote: It's up to God to do the judging. You haven't walked in my boots, so how are you going to judge me?
name: Aaron Neville

quote: You know, God has a plan for me, and I'm going to follow in his footsteps and just rejoice and be happy.
name: Gabby Douglas

quote: Every volcano is a powerful illustration of God's character. He is a Vesuvius of goodness, life, and energy.
name: Reinhard Bonnke

quote: The laws of nature are but the mathematical thoughts of God.
name: Euclid

quote: Every man's life is a fairy tale written by God's fingers.
name: Hans Christian Andersen

quote: In the absence of any other proof, the thumb alone would convince me of God's existence.
name: Isaac Newton

quote: I look back on being 17 and think, 'Oh my God, how did I not die?'
name: John Mulaney

quote: Non-violence requires a double faith, faith in God and also faith in man.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

name: Wayne Dyer

quote: God will not look you over for medals degrees or diplomas, but for scars.

quote: Heaven means to be one with God.
name: Confucius

quote: But God can only smile because only God can know what is coming next.
name: Desmond Tutu

quote: Until we meet again, may God bless you as he has blessed me.
name: Elvis Presley

quote: God gave you a gift of 86,400 seconds today. Have you used one to say 'thank you?'

quote: God writes the Gospel not in the Bible alone, but also on trees, and in the flowers and clouds and stars.
name: Martin Luther

quote: My philosophy is: Life is hard, but God is good. Try not to confuse the two.
name: Anne F. Beiler

quote: I can make a lord, but only God can make a gentleman.
name: King James I

quote: God Bless my mother and father for all the hard work they've done for our family.
name: Coy Bowles

quote: God always gives His best to those who leave the choice with him.
name: Jim Elliot

quote: If you want to be original just try being yourself, because God has never made two people exactly alike.
name: Bernard Meltzer

quote: Flowers are the sweetest things God ever made and forgot to put a soul into.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: It's a struggle for every young Black man. You know how it is, only God can judge us.
name: Tupac Shakur

quote: Stupidity is also a gift of God, but one mustn't misuse it.
name: Pope John Paul II

quote: God always strives together with those who strive.
name: Aeschylus

quote: We are never defeated unless we give up on God.
name: Ronald Reagan

quote: If God can work through me, he can work through anyone.
name: Francis of Assisi

quote: God sleeps in the minerals, awakens in plants, walks in animals, and thinks in man.
name: Arthur Young

quote: I believe that God has blessed me in immeasurable ways so that I can, in return, bless and help others.
name: Karen Civil

quote: Prayer is simply a two-way conversation between you and God.
name: Billy Graham

quote: God loves each of us as if there were only one of us.
name: Saint Augustine

quote: I want to know all Gods thoughts; all the rest are just details.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: As long as I have my faith in God, I'm good. I know everything else is going to come.
name: Derrick Rose

quote: God gives us our relatives, thank God we can choose our friends.
name: Ethel Watts Mumford

quote: Let us raise a standard to which the wise and honest can repair; the rest is in the hands of God.
name: George Washington

quote: God cannot give us a happiness and peace apart from Himself, because it is not there. There is no such thing.
name: C. S. Lewis

quote: Every day is a gift from God. Learn to focus on the Giver and enjoy the gift!
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: Part of me suspects that I'm a loser, and the other part of me thinks I'm God Almighty.

quote: Whatever I will become will be what God has chosen for me.
name: Elvis Presley

quote: Every day, I get closer to God. Every day, my will to do the right thing gets stronger.
name: DMX

quote: Love God; love others; do your best in all you do, even if you fall short!
name: Bethany Hamilton

quote: Let God's grace be the mosque, and devotion the prayer mat. Let the Quran be the good conduct.
name: Guru Nanak

quote: The soul can split the sky in two and let the face of God shine through.
name: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quote: I believe in one power, and that is the hand of God. I respect all religions.
name: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: First, I have to thank God for giving me the gift that he did as well as a second chance for a better life.

quote: Even in the tough times, He's still a good God.
name: Victoria Osteen

quote: God grant me the courage not to give up what I think is right even though I think it is hopeless.
name: Chester W. Nimitz

quote: Great thoughts and a pure heart, that is what we should ask from God.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: The more we come out and do good to others, the more our hearts will be purified, and God will be in them.
name: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Man gives you the award but God gives you the reward.
name: Denzel Washington

quote: The best place to find God is in a garden. You can dig for him there.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: To light one candle to God and another to the Devil is the principle of wisdom.
name: Jose Bergamin

quote: May God save the country, for it is evident that the people will not.
name: Millard Fillmore

quote: My nephews all look at me differently now. Before, they couldn't relate to me, and now I'm like a god.

quote: What God intended for you goes far beyond anything you can imagine.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: God bless perseverance. Because it's not easy.
name: Junot Diaz

quote: God hadn't made me handsome, but he'd given me something, I always felt: funny bones.
name: Jerry Lewis

quote: Mankind must remember that peace is not God's gift to his creatures; peace is our gift to each other.
name: Elie Wiesel

quote: Forgiveness is God's command.
name: Martin Luther

quote: Rebellion against tyrants is obedience to God.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: I gave in, and admitted that God was God.
name: C. S. Lewis

quote: An angel of God never has wings.
name: Joseph Smith, Jr.

quote: God is everywhere but He is most manifest in man. So serve man as God. That is as good as worshipping God.

quote: For God's sake hold your tongue, and let me love.
name: John Donne

quote: I know it's an experience that I need to have if God's putting me through it.
name: Lil Wayne

quote: God will take care of the poor trampled slave, but where will the slaveholder be when eternity begins?

quote: Faithful servants never retire. You can retire from your career, but you will never retire from serving God.
name: Rick Warren

quote: When we learn from experience, the scars of sin can lead us to restoration and a renewed intimacy with God.

quote: I fear God and next to God I mostly fear them that fear him not.
name: Saadi

quote: It is not fitting, when one is in God's service, to have a gloomy face or a chilling look.

quote: It is the quality of our work which will please God and not the quantity.

quote: Only one thing is impossible for God: To find any sense in any copyright law on the planet.

quote: You know, God gave me a gift to do other things besides play the game of basketball.

quote: As a child of God, I am greater than anything that can happen to me.
name: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Satan, the leader or dictator of devils, is the opposite, not of God, but of Michael.
name: C. S. Lewis

quote: Healing rain is a real touch from God. It could be physical healing or emotional or whatever.

quote: I give infinite thanks to God, who has been pleased to make me the first observer of marvelous things.

quote: God doesn't dwell in the wooden, stony or earthen idols. His abode is in our feelings, our thoughts.

quote: May we have communion with God in the secret of our hearts, and find Him to be to us as a little sanctuary.
name: Charles Spurgeon

quote: Religion is not man's relationship to God, it is man's relationship to man.
name: Elie Wiesel

quote: I know no words of prayer - God help me because I can not help myself.

quote: How can we live in harmony? First we need to know we are all madly in love with the same God.

quote: Keep God first, chase your dreams, and everything will pay off.

quote: In the name of God, stop a moment, cease your work, look around you.
name: Leo Tolstoy

quote: God is the indwelling and not the transient cause of all things.
name: Baruch Spinoza

quote: I die the king's faithful servant, but God's first.
name: Thomas More

quote: Don't you know there ain't no devil, it's just god when he's drunk.
name: Tom Waits

quote: God's mercy and grace give me hope - for myself, and for our world.
name: Billy Graham

quote: I speak Spanish to God, Italian to women, French to men, and German to my horse.
name: Charles V

quote: I cannot believe in a God who wants to be praised all the time.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: If God wanted us to bend over he'd put diamonds on the floor.
name: Joan Rivers

quote: God lends a helping hand to the man who tries hard.
name: Aeschylus

quote: Freedom prospers when religion is vibrant and the rule of law under God is acknowledged.
name: Ronald Reagan

quote: Our society strives to avoid any possibility of offending anyone - except God.
name: Billy Graham

quote: If I am not, may God put me there; and if I am, may God so keep me.
name: Joan of Arc

quote: Sometimes I do get to places just when God's ready to have somebody click the shutter.
name: Ansel Adams

quote: I think that God, in creating man, somewhat overestimated his ability.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: Everything can change in the blink of an eye. But don't worry; God never blinks.
name: Regina Brett

quote: Good man! Genuine gentleman! God bless George Thompson, the great-hearted friend of my race.

quote: The perfection of Christian character depends wholly upon the grace and strength found alone in God.

quote: When trouble comes, focus on God's ability to care for you.
name: Charles Stanley

quote: Where there is devotional music, God is always at hand with His gracious presence.

quote: God is bigger than people think.
name: Jimmy Dean

quote: God's truth judges created things out of love, and Satan's truth judges them out of envy and hatred.

quote: We Americans have no commission from God to police the world.
name: Benjamin Harrison

name: Empedocles

quote: I think when you work really hard and you help others, God helps you get what you want.
name: Gina Rodriguez

quote: I am responsible only to God and history.
name: Francisco Franco

quote: Courage, not compromise, brings the smile of God's approval.
name: Thomas S. Monson

quote: We say God and the imagination are one... How high that highest candle lights the dark.
name: Wallace Stevens

quote: He who is a slave to his stomach seldom worships God.
name: Saadi

quote: The most important thing as a leader is your relationship with God.
name: Manny Pacquiao

quote: Nature is the art of God.
name: Dante Alighieri

quote: God has two dwellings; one in heaven, and the other in a meek and thankful heart.
name: Izaak Walton

quote: You may call God love, you may call God goodness. But the best name for God is compassion.
name: Meister Eckhart

quote: Each one prays to God according to his own light.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: God helps those who help themselves.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: God gives the nuts, but he does not crack them.
name: Franz Kafka

quote: May God protect me from gloomy saints.

quote: You never know God is all you need until God is all you have.
name: Rick Warren

quote: Never be afraid to trust an unknown future to a known God.
name: Corrie Ten Boom

quote: There cannot be a God because if there were one, I could not believe that I was not He.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I'm thankful to God that my life changed, but I'm also still on my grind.
name: Tory Lanez

quote: I'm an atheist and I thank God for it.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: We cannot embrace God's forgiveness if we are so busy clinging to past wounds and nursing old grudges.
name: T. D. Jakes

quote: If I had to choose a religion, the sun as the universal giver of life would be my god.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Find new ways to spread the word of God to every corner of the world.
name: Pope Francis

quote: Every perfect life is a parable invented by God.
name: Simone Weil

quote: In feature films the director is God; in documentary films God is the director.
name: Alfred Hitchcock

quote: Your faithfulness makes you trustworthy to God.
name: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: At Baptism, I received grace - that quality that makes me share in the very nature of God.
name: Mother Angelica

quote: Work, apart from devotion or love of God, is helpless and cannot stand alone.
name: Ramakrishna

quote: All men are born with a nose and five fingers, but no one is born with a knowledge of God.
name: Voltaire

quote: I do not so much rejoice that God hath made me to be a Queen, as to be a Queen over so thankful a people.
name: Elizabeth I

quote: Love is the greatest gift that God has given us. It's free.
name: Taraji P. Henson

quote: Worship is a way of seeing the world in the light of God.
name: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quote: God bless America. God save the Queen. God defend New Zealand and thank Christ for Australia.
name: Russell Crowe

quote: God knows I gave my best in baseball at all times and no man on earth can truthfully judge me otherwise.
name: Shoeless Joe Jackson

quote: Reason in man is rather like God in the world.
name: Thomas Aquinas

quote: Smiles, tears, of all my life! - and, if God choose, I shall but love thee better after death.
name: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: I don't want a monument. We don't build monuments; we build God's Kingdom.
name: Reinhard Bonnke

quote: God may forgive your sins, but your nervous system won't.
name: Alfred Korzybski

quote: You can never forget God. If you forget God, he's gon' forget you.
name: Offset

quote: God is a frequency. Stay tuned.
name: Alan Cohen

quote: Live, so you do not have to look back and say: 'God, how I have wasted my life.'
name: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quote: God exists since mathematics is consistent, and the Devil exists since we cannot prove it.
name: Andre Weil

quote: God, I can push the grass apart and lay my finger on Thy heart.
name: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quote: Thank God for the journey.
name: James Brown

quote: It is better to go skiing and think of God, than go to church and think of sport.
name: Fridtjof Nansen

quote: Now God be praised, I will die in peace.
name: James Wolfe

quote: God gets you to the plate, but once your there your on your own.
name: Ted Williams

quote: There is no work, however vile or sordid, that does not glisten before God.
name: John Calvin

quote: Adoration is caring for God above all else.
name: Evelyn Underhill

quote: Some of God's greatest gifts are unanswered prayers.
name: Garth Brooks

quote: I would rather die than do something which I know to be a sin, or to be against God's will.
name: Joan of Arc

quote: God does not play dice.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: It's wonderful to climb the liquid mountains of the sky. Behind me and before me is God and I have no fears.
name: Helen Keller

quote: When the solution is simple, God is answering.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Whatever your heart clings to and confides in, that is really your God.
name: Martin Luther

quote: For where God built a church, there the Devil would also build a chapel.
name: Martin Luther

quote: If God dropped acid, would he see people?
name: Steven Wright

quote: Every child comes with the message that God is not yet discouraged of man.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Yeah, I know I'm ugly... I said to a bartender, 'Make me a zombie.' He said 'God beat me to it.'
name: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: Not only does God play dice, but... he sometimes throws them where they cannot be seen.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: All God wants of man is a peaceful heart.
name: Meister Eckhart

quote: One and God make a majority.
name: Frederick Douglass

quote: Talent is a gift which God has given us secretly, and which we reveal without perceiving it.
name: Montesquieu

quote: Isn't it amazing that we are all made in God's image, and yet there is so much diversity among his people?
name: Desmond Tutu

quote: The function of prayer is not to influence God, but rather to change the nature of the one who prays.
name: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: Without God, democracy will not and cannot long endure.
name: Ronald Reagan

quote: I think it pisses God off if you walk by the color purple in a field somewhere and don't notice it.
name: Alice Walker

quote: The straight line belongs to men, the curved one to God.
name: Antoni Gaudi

quote: If you want to make God laugh, tell him about your plans.
name: Woody Allen

quote: God is a metaphor for that which transcends all levels of intellectual thought. It's as simple as that.
name: Joseph Campbell

quote: The blame is his who chooses: God is blameless.
name: Plato

quote: Don't let the winds blow your dreams away... or steal your faith in God.
name: Vin Scully

quote: If God did not exist, it would be necessary to invent Him.
name: Voltaire

quote: Whatsoever is, is in God, and without God nothing can be, or be conceived.
name: Baruch Spinoza

quote: When God sneezed, I didn't know what to say.
name: Henny Youngman

quote: God gave me a great body and it's my duty to take care of my physical temple.
name: Jean-Claude Van Damme

quote: God, life changes faster than you think.
name: Amy Tan

quote: To love someone means to see him as God intended him.
name: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote: If God had wanted me otherwise, He would have created me otherwise.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Has God forgotten all I have done for Him.
name: Louis XIV

quote: God meets daily needs daily. Not weekly or annually. He will give you what you need when it is needed.
name: Max Lucado

quote: God does nothing except in response to believing prayer.
name: John Wesley

quote: Human beings should be held accountable. Leave God alone. He has enough problems.
name: Elie Wiesel

quote: Earth's crammed with heaven, And every common bush afire with God: But only he who sees takes off his shoes.
name: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: To be full of things is to be empty of God. To be empty of things is to be full of God.
name: Meister Eckhart

quote: A God is thinkable, therefore a God is also actually present.
name: Moses Mendelssohn

quote: God's purpose is more important than our plans.
name: Myles Munroe

quote: I believe in destiny, God's hand and hard work.
name: Katrina Kaif

quote: I must listen as God speaks to my soul through good thoughts, inspirations, and intuitions.
name: Mother Angelica

quote: I used to pray that God would make me a great athlete, and He never did.
name: Lou Holtz

quote: Laughter is God's blessing.
name: Joseph Prince

quote: Bottom line, your body is a temple, and you have to treat it that way. That's how God designed it.
name: Ray Lewis

quote: God made the world round so we would never be able to see too far down the road.
name: Karen Blixen

quote: I spend a lot of time in prayer. God doesn't always show up on my time, but he always shows up!
name: Rachel Boston

quote: God may not guide us in an obvious way because he wants us to make decisions based on faith and character.
name: Dallas Willard

quote: God's wounds cure, sin's kisses kill.
name: William Gurnall

quote: Mirth is the sweet wine of human life. It should be offered sparkling with zestful life unto God.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: There is no place in my soul, no corner of my character, where God is not.
name: Evelyn Underhill

quote: I'm a survivor of life. I try to give the glory to God and appreciate what's happening to me.
name: Mike Epps

quote: Cast your cares on God; that anchor holds.
name: Frank Moore Colby

quote: I fear God and respect God and love God.
name: Brett Ratner

quote: Before me, even as behind, God is, and all is well.
name: John Greenleaf Whittier

quote: A god who let us prove his existence would be an idol.
name: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quote: God cannot alter the past, though historians can.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: Marrying for love may be a bit risky, but it is so honest that God can't help but smile on it.
name: Josh Billings

quote: God made the Idiot for practice, and then He made the School Board.
name: Mark Twain

quote: The God who gave us life, gave us liberty at the same time.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: God's promises are all on condition of humble obedience.
name: Ellen G. White

quote: I don't have the strength or wisdom to get through a single day without guidance and grace from God.
name: Tony Dungy

quote: Bitterness and unforgiveness block the flow of God's blessing in your life and actually hinder your prayers.
name: Victoria Osteen

quote: If I had any talent that God could give me, I would be a great diva.
name: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quote: God sometimes does try to the uttermost those whom he wishes to bless.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Hope is like peace. It is not a gift from God. It is a gift only we can give one another.
name: Elie Wiesel

quote: Oh, my God, this amazing cool breeze is coming through my window and the sun is shining. I'm happy.
name: Liv Tyler

quote: God, as Truth, has been for me a treasure beyond price. May He be so to every one of us.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Men must be governed by God or they will be ruled by tyrants.
name: William Penn

quote: Only he can take great resolves who has indomitable faith in God and has fear of God.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: If God had wanted man to play soccer, he wouldn't have given us arms.
name: Mike Ditka

quote: To you I'm an atheist; to God, I'm the Loyal Opposition.
name: Woody Allen

quote: I am what I am, I'm doing very well in my life, and I'm thankful to God for that.
name: LL Cool J

quote: A person whose mind is quiet and satisfied in God is in the pathway to health.
name: Ellen G. White

quote: If you want me to believe in God, you must make me touch him.
name: Denis Diderot

quote: I sometimes think that God in creating man somewhat overestimated his ability.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: I have offended God and mankind because my work didn't reach the quality it should have.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: The only way you can serve God is by serving other people.
name: Rick Warren

quote: I don't stand for the black man's side, I don' t stand for the white man's side. I stand for God's side.
name: Bob Marley

quote: If there is no God, everything is permitted.
name: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote: God didn't make a mistake when He made you. You need to see yourself as God sees you.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: Where mercy, love, and pity dwell, there God is dwelling too.
name: William Blake

quote: To do all that one is able to do, is to be a man; to do all that one would like to do, is to be a god.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: I would say my grandmother would be like my personal god.
name: Jamie Foxx

quote: Each daughter of God is of infinite worth because of her divine mission.
name: Russell M. Nelson

quote: Man is born broken. He lives by mending. The grace of God is glue.
name: Eugene O'Neill

quote: Humility is the gateway into the grace and the favor of God.
name: Harold Warner

quote: God wants you to be a winner, not a whiner.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: There are gods, but there is no God; and all gods become devils eventually.
name: Robert Anton Wilson

quote: I said to the almond tree, 'Friend, speak to me of God,' and the almond tree blossomed.
name: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: I have nothing to ask for, thanks to God. Everything I have, God has given me.
name: Mariano Rivera

quote: I can't believe that God put us on this earth to be ordinary.
name: Lou Holtz

quote: The great test of life is obedience to God.
name: Ezra Taft Benson

quote: The grace of God is courtesy.
name: Hilaire Belloc

quote: I found thee not, O Lord, without, because I erred in seeking thee without that wert within.
name: Saint Augustine

quote: God is best known in not knowing him.
name: Saint Augustine

quote: I don't think that a same-sex marriage is the way God intended it to be.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: The God of this world is riches, pleasure and pride.
name: Martin Luther

quote: God is the tangential point between zero and infinity.
name: Alfred Jarry

quote: I am a Catholic, not so committed to the church, but to the idea of the Virgin, the female face of God.
name: Paulo Coelho

quote: God's desire is that we excel.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: I'm far from being god, but I work god damn hard.
name: Jay-Z

quote: Marriage has made me a lot happier and I'm deeply in love with my wife, and I thank God for her every day.
name: Harry Connick, Jr.

quote: My guru said that when he suffers, it brings him closer to God. I have found this, too.
name: Ram Dass

quote: After all, God is God because he remembers.
name: Elie Wiesel

quote: Thank God I'm with the love of my life. That's why I know I'm right where I'm supposed to be.
name: Garth Brooks

quote: God has entrusted me with myself.
name: Epictetus

quote: All my life I thank God. My family was very religious.
name: Pele

quote: I consider wisdom supernatural because it isn't taught by men - it's a gift from God.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: Only God can look at somebody's heart.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: My message is that God is a good God.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: When you repent and operate on God's standards, now you have restoration and reconciliation.
name: Tony Evans

quote: Do everything according to God, and be nice, and treat other people the way you would like to be treated.
name: Glen Campbell

quote: Thank God I'm very satisfied with the way God created me, and I wouldn't change a thing.
name: Leila Lopes

quote: Beethoven can write music, thank God, but he can do nothing else on earth.
name: Ludwig van Beethoven

quote: I can't imagine God not allowing my dog into heaven.
name: Rick Warren

quote: God is limitless in His love, and asks that we at least make the effort to be limitless in ours.
name: Marianne Williamson

quote: Young man, young man, your arm's too short to box with God.
name: James Weldon Johnson

quote: To love another person is to see the face of God.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: He was a wise man who originated the idea of God.
name: Euripides

quote: We can stand affliction better than we can prosperity, for in prosperity we forget God.
name: Dwight L. Moody

quote: God never made a promise that was too good to be true.
name: Dwight L. Moody

quote: What ever disunites man from God, also disunites man from man.
name: Edmund Burke

quote: God hangs the greatest weights upon the smallest wires.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: Knowledge of God's Word is a bulwark against deception, temptation, accusation, even persecution.
name: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: The only thing that stops God from sending another flood is that the first one was useless.
name: Nicolas Chamfort

quote: I am composing like a god, as if it simply had to be done as it has been done.
name: Franz Schubert

quote: There are no limits to where our brains can take us. We are, if there be a God, God's gracious creation.
name: John Lydon

quote: God never did make a more calm, quiet, innocent recreation than angling.
name: Izaak Walton

quote: It may be that our role on this planet is not to worship God - but to create him.
name: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: Do not compare yourself. Find out what God has placed in your ability.
name: Emmitt Smith

quote: If you will come back and make that pledge, God will heal your heart tonight.
name: Benny Hinn

quote: God gives talent. Work transforms talent into genius.
name: Anna Pavlova

quote: Prayer means that the total you is praying. Your whole being reaches out to God, and God reaches down to you.
name: E. Stanley Jones

quote: My walk on the moon lasted three days. My walk with God will last forever.
name: Charles Duke

quote: I have faith in faith. God is there, whether we have faith or not, so why not have faith in him?
name: Valerie Bertinelli

quote: God takes care of imbeciles, little children and artists.
name: Camille Pissarro

quote: One must be very particular about telling the truth. Through truth one can realize God.
name: Ramakrishna

quote: Life is God's novel. Let him write it.
name: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quote: God has been faithful time and again to surround me with people that sharpen me and that make me better.
name: TobyMac

quote: God must hate common people, because he made them so common.
name: Philip Wylie

quote: God, I love daydreaming out plane windows.
name: Alysia Reiner

quote: Reason is God's crowning gift to man.
name: Sophocles

quote: Every creature is a word of God.
name: Meister Eckhart

quote: The way to be with God in every season is to strive to be near Him every week and each day.
name: Thomas S. Monson

quote: God gave me life to continue to do things that I would never have done.
name: Stevie Wonder

quote: Even God lends a hand to honest boldness.
name: Menander

quote: Each one of us is an outlet to God and an inlet to God.
name: Ernest Holmes

quote: If you must be mad, be it not for the things of the world. Be mad with the love of God.
name: Ramakrishna

quote: Many are the names of God and infinite the forms through which He may be approached.
name: Ramakrishna

quote: I think that anything that begins to give people a sense of their own worth and dignity is God.
name: John Shelby Spong

quote: At the cross God wrapped his heart in flesh and blood and let it be nailed to the cross for our redemption.
name: E. Stanley Jones

quote: God is a verb, not a noun.
name: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: There is nothing unpremeditated, nothing neglected by God. His unsleeping eye beholds all things.
name: Saint Basil

quote: Whatever comes from God is impossible for a man to turn back.
name: Herodotus

quote: Your God is ever beside you - indeed, He is even within you.
name: Alphonsus Liguori

quote: People see God every day, they just don't recognize him.
name: Pearl Bailey

quote: They always win who side with God.
name: Frederick William Faber

quote: God is one, greatest of gods and men, not like mortals in body or thought.
name: Xenophanes

quote: God sent Jesus as an example to see if we could retain and maintain the Holy Spirit in human flesh.
name: Benny Hinn

quote: God is in the sadness and the laughter, in the bitter and the sweet.
name: Neale Donald Walsch

quote: God will never reject you. Whether you accept Him is your decision.
name: Charles Stanley

quote: I've said all along that God is in control.
name: Tony Dungy

quote: To lovers of the truth, nothing can be put before God and hope in Him.
name: Saint Basil

quote: Nothing that is God's is obtainable by money.
name: Tertullian

quote: Nobody talks so constantly about God as those who insist that there is no God.
name: Heywood Broun

quote: God is an unutterable sigh, planted in the depths of the soul.
name: Jean Paul

quote: For it pleased God, after he had made all things by the word of his power, to create man after his own image.
name: George Whitefield

quote: Trust in God - she will provide.
name: Emmeline Pankhurst

quote: God is not a cosmic bellboy for whom we can press a button to get things.
name: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quote: In myself I am nothing. It all comes from God and the Virgin Mary.
name: Lech Walesa

quote: When it is a question of God's almighty Spirit, never say, 'I can't.'
name: Oswald Chambers

quote: A thick skin is a gift from God.
name: Konrad Adenauer

quote: Since His delights are to be with you, let yours be found in Him.
name: Alphonsus Liguori

quote: Sometimes you ask God for something and you don't know what you're asking.
name: Mahalia Jackson

quote: The Bible is not man's word about God, but God's word about man.
name: John Barth

quote: The world sees in our conduct, in our behaviour, the proof that we are the real children of God.
name: Pope Shenouda III

quote: But I know God has big stuff planned that ultimately doesn't have anything to do with me.
name: Michael W. Smith

quote: God, from a beautiful necessity, is Love.
name: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quote: The Bible is a revelation of the mind and will of God to men. Therein we may learn, what God is.
name: Jupiter Hammon

quote: God in His wisdom has decided that He will reward no works but His own.
name: Johannes Tauler

quote: We are made to know and love God.
name: Nicolas Malebranche

quote: Sometimes God writes straightforward in twisted lines.
name: Gloria Trevi
